title: Burning amulet

properties.name: description
properties.value: A burning amulet is a topaz amulet enchanted via the Lvl-3 Enchant spell.

A burning amulet is a topaz amulet enchanted via the Lvl-3 Enchant spell.

When rubbed, the amulet can teleport the player to various locations in the Wilderness; players will be given a warning before teleporting. After all five charges are used, the amulet will disintegrate.

  1. ↑ Manual casting is 3 ticks, auto-casting is 7 ticks
  2. ↑ Due to Grand Exchange prices changing based on trade volume, this profit may not be fully accurate if the components are infrequently traded.

Teleportation options[edit | edit source]

Destination Map
Chaos Temple
Bandit Camp
Lava Maze

Price per teleport[edit | edit source]

Because the high alchemy value is the same regardless of the number of charges, some of the cost of usage can be reclaimed by alching when one charge remains.

Item Amulet Cost Cost Per Teleport Cost if Alching[n 1]
Burning amulet(5) 3,734 −747 −789
  1. ↑ Assuming a staff of fire or variant is used.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
31 August 2017
(update)

Partially charged versions of the item could now be turned into bank placeholders.

16 February 2017
(update)

The item's inventory sprite was rotated, so that unenchanted silver jewellery now has non-standard angles instead.

9 February 2017
(update)

The "Rub" and "Use" options were switched so Use is now first.
